chunk_prompt: Summarize this content about Breast infection/sepsis symptoms:
final_prompt: Summarize this content about Breast infection/sepsis symptoms:

sentences.text: not an "omg you gonna die" but definitely take a trip soon to get any cat bites checked.
if you've been strangled always go to the er after.
red streaks near a wound, particularly on the limbs, can indicate a spreading infection and may be an early sign of sepsis.
i know two people who had no other symptoms besides the streaks both were admitted for sepsis and in hospital for a while.
sudden onset dementia, especially in old women and diaper wearers, might be the only symptom of a bladder infection.
if it is that, antibiotics will fix it.

chunks.raw_summary: Red streaks near a wound, particularly on the limbs, can indicate a spreading infection and may be an early sign of sepsis . sudden onset dementia, especially in old women and diaper wearers, might be the only symptom of a bladder infection .
chunks.cleaned_summary: Red streaks near a wound, particularly on the limbs, can indicate a spreading infection and may be an early sign of sepsis. sudden onset dementia, especially in old women and diaper wearers, might be the only symptom of a bladder infection.
